alert.note: Alert for Grainger; Jefferson; Knox (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 2:54PM CDT until May 16 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Knox County in east Tennessee... Northwestern Jefferson County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Grainger County in east Tennessee... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 354 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Plainview, or 10 miles south of Maynardville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jefferson City, New Market, Strawberry Plains, Blaine, House Mountain State Park, Maloneyville, Mascot and Piedmont. This includes Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 413 and 415. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
